name: Hadibo Traditional Kitchen
description: Family-run restaurant serving authentic Socotri cuisine including fresh fish, traditional bread, and local honey. Try the grilled lobster caught that morning.

name: Homhil Plateau Trek
description: Guided hike to see the famous bottle trees and Dragon's Blood Trees. Best visited during early morning for optimal lighting and wildlife activity.

name: Koks Restaurant
description: Michelin-starred restaurant focusing on traditional Faroese cuisine using local ingredients like fermented lamb, seabirds, and foraged herbs.

name: Kallur Lighthouse Hike
description: Dramatic hike to the northernmost point of the Faroe Islands. Breathtaking views but requires good weather conditions and proper gear.

name: Arborek Village Tour
description: Visit a traditional Papuan village where locals have embraced sustainable tourism. Learn about their culture and marine conservation efforts.

name: Raja Ampat Dive Lodge
description: Eco-friendly overwater bungalows with direct reef access. Perfect for serious divers with on-site PADI certification and equipment rental.
